name: Crime World: The Story of Noil Chen (Visual Novel)
name_original: Crime World: The Story of Noil Chen (Visual Novel)
description:
A visual novel story of Investigator Noil Chen in the Crime World Series.

Type: Kinetic Novel
Genre: Mystery, Action, Fantasy, Crime Fiction, Thriller
Language: English
Engine: Ren'py
Duration: Average to long
Age: 14+/16+ (18+)
Platforms: Windows

Enjoy!

Disclaimer: "All characters and events depicted in this story are entirely fictitious. Any similarity to actual events or persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental."
